entry.title: BitMail - p2p Email 0.1. beta
entry.summary: The original topic was BitMail, and there is currently a server running to test it at BitMail.sf.net. The server will be running for the next few days, and its IP address is 178.83.35.133:4710. Additionally, an HTML attachment was scrubbed, but no further information was provided about its content or relevance to BitMail or the server.
